english.segment1: Awake from winters rest. Why cleave unto the dust?. From lower loves, desires, pursuits, and fears. Dont wait for passing moments. Im calling for you now. Im calling for you to come
english.segment2: Rise up my love (rise up). My fair one, come away. Rise up my Love (my love). My fair one, come away
english.segment3: Kindle sacred flames. Of love within my heart. My love I count you fair. This argument to rise. Dont wait for passing moments. Im calling for you now. Im calling for you to come
